title: New York Man Sentenced to 2 Years in Prison for Role in Tax Fraud and ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the District of Connecticut ) Deirdre M. Daly, United States Attorney for the District of Connecticut, announced that, CESAR PENSON-PEREZ, 28, of New York , N.Y. , was sentenced today by Chief U.S.
